title: Special Construction Dual Axle Flatbed Trailer
item_description:
Special Construction Dual Axle Flatbed Trailer

Trailer Details

  • VIN: CA1081500
  • License: 4LC7087
    • Registration Expiration Date: 11/30/2026
  • Year Per DMV: 0000 
  • Trailer Type: Flatbed
  • Make per DMV: SPCNS (Special Construction)
  • GVWR: 5,000 lb

Dimensions

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: Lt225-75R16
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 2 5/16" Ball

 

  • Two-Axel Flatbed Trailer
  • Dimensions: Width- 7’. Length – 16’
  • Heavy steel frame, solid ¾” plywood floor, tie-downs on front, back and sides.

Note: No title was ever issued for this trailer. Application for PTI with Transfer and Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks following auction removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual, the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, application for title, taxes, and fees due to DMV.
